name: Name Quiver
tag_list: domains, domain-names, domain-broker, domain-brokers, domain-sales, domain-name-sales, domain-purchases, social-com, cyntia-king
overview: Name Quiver is the domain brokerage arm of Marksmen. Founded in 1998, Marksmen is a world leader in IP protection services, including trademark clearance and enforcement investigations, determining business method patents and processes, establishing and locating prior art, due diligence, worldwide on-ground investigations, litigation support and Internet related infringements. Additionally, Marksmen negotiates the purchase or sale of IP rights internationally and monitors the Internet for both Web content and domain name registrations.
